description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Blast, scorch and sprint your way through hordes of monsters, zombies and robots! Collect upgrades and weapon power-ups as you make your way through 50 action packed stages, all while dual wielding a gun and a flamethrower for twice the deadly firepower.
description.short: Blast, scorch and sprint your way through hordes of monsters, zombies and robots! Collect upgrades and weapon power-ups as you make your way through 50 action packed stages, all while dual wielding a gun and a flamethrower for twice the deadly firepower.
